snippet: Gov. Chris Christie, once hailed as a defender of local Muslims against prejudice, now opposes resettling Syrian refugees in this country.
abstract: New Jersey Gov Chris Christie, once considered defender of Muslim communities against right-wing extremism, has recast himself as warrior against terrorism in bid to secure Republican presidential nomination, abandoning former stance and damaging ties to local Muslim communities; Muslims are particularly distressed by Christie's rigid stance against taking in Syrian refugees and failure to more strongly rebuke Donald J Trump for his anti-Muslim statements.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Chris Christie, once hailed as a defender of local Muslims against prejudice, now opposes resettling Syrian refugees in this country.

headline.main: Once Embraced by Chris Christie, New Jersey’s Muslims Feel Betrayed
headline.print_headline: Once Embraced by Christie, State’s Muslims Feel Betrayed
